Html:
COM wrapper could solve a problem
(how to delete posted message?)
I'm absolutely no expert on cpp, but you might want to use Proj.4 for your purpose (http://proj.maptools.org/).

I'm trying to wrap ProjNet in COM.
Proj4 can not parse WKT prj (or at least this api is hiding deep inside the code)
btw: is it possible to drop my previous erroneous messages?

I have no idea whether you could accomplish that, but to us .NET developers COM is a swear word of the worst kind :-)
I can tell you so much that none of the methods are exposed to COM, so you would have to add that yourself.
